name: Asphyre
short_description: Asphyre is a cross-platform framework for developing video games and scientific applications in Delphi and FreePascal/Lazarus. The framework provides facilities for real-time rendering of graphics, text output, mathematics and networking communication, among others.
summary: Asphyre is a cross-platform framework for Delphi and FreePascal.
